text: A Touch of Class is a 1973 British romantic comedy movie directed by Melvin Frank and stars Glenda Jackson, George Segal, Paul Sorvino, K Callan, Simon Rouse. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. It was nominated for 5 Oscars and won for Best Actress in 1974. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1973 romantic comedy movies Category:British romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Melvin Frank Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in England Category:Movies set in Spain
title: A Touch of Class (movie)
